name: Downtown Club
summary:
🔰 NOW IN EARLY ACCESS! 🔰

Downtown Club is a simcade racing game with full virtual controls and exciting driving feedback, built from the ground up for standalone VR. Grab wheel, shifter and handbrake, take full control of your car and become a motorsport champion!

🏁 GAME MODES
Events: win thematic competitions to unlock content
Custom Race: play with completely personalized settings
Time Attack: improve your lap times and join the online leaderboards
Free Drive: take a break and explore the map...
